segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and see the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, towel in hand, totally absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on, but that's not the shocking part.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is full and overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down like a river onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, yet she keeps polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, something else catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a stool, teetering towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's leaning back dangerouslyâ€” he could topple any moment!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies while balancing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, eyes wide in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a serene garden, so contrasting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected such hazards in this simple scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all unfolding so unexpectedly before me.
segments.speaker: PAR
